trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when policy forbids code to run.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod når policyen forbyr kode kjøres.

trans-unit.source: This exception is typically thrown when the code requests more permissions than the policy will grant or the policy is configured to prohibit running the code.
trans-unit.target: Denne unntak vanligvis når koden ber om flere tillatelser enn policyen vil gi eller policyen er konfigurert til å ikke kjøre koden.

trans-unit.source: PolicyException uses the HRESULT CORSEC_E_POLICY_EXCEPTION.
trans-unit.target: PolicyException bruker HRESULT CORSEC_E_POLICY_EXCEPTION.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of PolicyException, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av PolicyException, kan du se konstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"> </xref> klasse standardegenskapene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Lokaliserte feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>returnerer samme verdi som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| Referansen for det indre unntaket. | | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil melding strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som forklarer hvorfor unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `exception` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `exception` parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.
